My investigation into Vitamin-C infusions never got very far.   They are extremely expensive (that stopped me right there), no one is willing to share actual statistics, and I was never able to unearth any patients who could talk about the impact on their health.  That said, I want to strongly endorse all the above comments.   A program of gradual weight loss would serve you far, far better than spending thousands of dollars on an unproven medical treatment.   You would greatly improve your odds in treatment and more effectively control your diabetes.  Weight and insulin resistance is a crucial issue in treatment success, and unfortunately there's just no way of getting around that.  Here is a URL to an article that you might find helpful:Insulin Resistance Impairs Response to IFN/RBVBest of luck to you.
